plot: Karey Brant wakes up on a Sunday Morning and turns on the TV to learn that America is under full scale nuclear attack. The first thing he thinks about is Michelle McDoogal, the only woman he feels can comfort him in this time of despair. Karey sets out to find Michelle and soon realizes winning her love is not going to be as easy as he expected...   Written by  Anonymous
title: Sunday Morning
